description: portrait, half length of painter turned left almost in profile, looking back right; wearing a cloak with left hand on waist; part of a classical building at left with others in distance; after a self portrait
inscription:
Signature,Title, and Inscription

on sheet in black: FRANCISCUS A MIERIS / Pictor Leidensis | in pencil on sheet 2-67 | under image on mount in brown: H. 7\" 11\"\'  L. 5\" 9\"\'  | on mount below image in brown:  C.Moor sc.
title: Portrait of Frans van Mieris
